extendedInfo.description: Take Canadaâs #1 classifieds site with you wherever you go! The Kijiji Classifieds app allows you to:- Post ads easily and use your camera/ gallery to add photos- Access My Kijiji  - Sign in to manage your ads i.e. view, edit, delete and Bump Upâ¨- Search and browse for items/ services in a province, city or sub area.   o   Refine results by price & other key attributes   o   Sort results by date, price and distance   o   Recent searches automatically saved on your phone- Sync watchlists â sign in and access your watchlists on your phone or on www.kijiji.ca- Reply to sellers or call them up directly with your phone- Share ads with your friends and social networks- Support for both English and French speaking usersMore info at www.kijiji.ca/android

reviews.title: Amazing!!
reviews.comment: Great! This is almost perfect! The last thing this app needs is looking at photos quickly.. Like swiping your finger to the next picture!
reviews.author: Troy Medalla

reviews.title: Getting Better, but...
reviews.comment: Still. Everytime we change search locations why do we have to re-enter what item we\'re looking for?
reviews.author: Jason Souliere

reviews.title: Kijiji
reviews.comment: Im trying to sell something but it wont let me choose a catagory for it to be in! Iveuninstalled n reunstalled about 4 times now. I give up.  So this app is staying uninstalled.
reviews.author: K Dee

reviews.title: Disappointed. ..
reviews.comment: This app was my fav... but the new upgrade is terrible...it glitches and its a bad design... :(
reviews.author: Tara Kay

reviews.title: Search categories missing?
reviews.comment: Where is the category filter in the search function? When I click it, it shows up as blank
reviews.author: Max Chen

reviews.title: Not good
reviews.comment: Can\'t turn off the top ad. This sucks also content is irrelevant and from different Provinces. I would do a search every time I had a chance for a deal, not anymore.
reviews.author: Dan Bisson

reviews.title: Loose the top rated ads in browse results!
reviews.comment: Great ap though on the new update, the top rated ads being mixed in with the browse results after every 20th ad is super annoying. This needs to go!!!
reviews.author: Chad Urbanovitch

reviews.title: You have all cstegories
reviews.comment: When you click to change the category, no options come up. Also dont like the hidden design of the watchlist. Please change!
reviews.author: Jenny Menard

reviews.title: Won\'t load Categories
reviews.comment: I can\'t browse by category or even search in one. They\'re just blank. Used to love this app too :(
reviews.author: Lois Como

reviews.title: Recent version - no good
reviews.comment: Can\'t get a list of categories to refine browsing our search results! Fix it!
reviews.author: Jordan J

reviews.title: Missing categories in new upgrade!
reviews.comment: There\'s nothing in the category list now! No matter what way you try.. In browse... Search... Or in post. Why did you even make the use update when it\'s worst??? :(
reviews.author: Anna Siu

reviews.title: What happened?
reviews.comment: What happened?  It doesn\'t seem to work since the last update.  Searching for anything comes up with no results.  Browsing by category comes up with no categories to browse.  Try debugging before releasing... it normally works.
reviews.author: John Pagac

reviews.title: Bad update
reviews.comment: This app was good until the last update now it is not loading any results at all
reviews.author: David Clarke

reviews.title: Awesome.
reviews.comment: They fixed the \'search bug\' quickly. It is fully working now.
reviews.author: John Michael Mayo

reviews.title: Love it but upgrade won\'t work
reviews.comment: Love kijiji app! Best thing ever! But since I upgraded it will not work... I\'m missing out :L
reviews.author: Jess Baker

reviews.title: Nice grid
reviews.comment: The grid feature is nice...but where are my watched items???  They disappeared after latest update.   Please bring back asap.
reviews.author: Russell Schick

reviews.title: Nexus 4
reviews.comment: Can you please fix new update continues freezing when trying to send email\'s.
reviews.author: Wesley Taylor

reviews.title: Meh could be better
reviews.comment: Liked the old kijiji app alot better this onr glitches and blacks out my screen on quite a regular basis since the update. I use to use this app on a daily basis not anymore since all the glitches started too much off a headache :( perhaps if they fixed everything I would continue using this app
reviews.author: Jon Gravelle

reviews.title: Poor upgrade
reviews.comment: If u like using this app. Then dont update it until they fix all the glitches.
reviews.author: John Weller

reviews.title: It Works
reviews.comment: The app now works without any major issues. I liked the previous version more though. I don\'t find any improvements in the user experience with this latest version.
reviews.author: Cliff W
